data.lyric:
[ti:Cold As You]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Ain't Always What You Get (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Cold As You - Luke Combs
[00:06.65]Lyrics by：Luke Combs/Jonathan Singleton/Shane Minor/Randy Montana
[00:13.30]Composed by：Luke Combs/Jonathan Singleton/Shane Minor/Randy Montana
[00:19.96]Just a junked out joint off a backroad
[00:23.64]Blinkin' window sign with an arrow
[00:26.78]The gravel Iot chock full of toolbox trucks
[00:30.23]Makin' their happy hour way home
[00:33.45]When guys like me lose girls like you
[00:36.76]That's where we run to
[00:39.77]They got Whiskey River on a jukebox
[00:43.39]The honky tonk sawdust dance floor
[00:46.69]A neon five o'clock pro clock
[00:50.13]Plenty d**n many when you want one more
[00:53.06]Of this broke heart fool on an old bar stool
[00:56.66]Drinkin' beer almost as cold as you
[01:06.63]Bunch of good time numbers on the stall door
[01:10.21]Picture you on a dart board
[01:13.33]Them cinder block walls ain't ever been cleaned
[01:16.87]Still ain't as dirty as you done me
[01:20.21]Whiskey River on a jukebox
[01:23.38]The honky tonk sawdust dance floor
[01:26.73]A neon five o'clock pro clock
[01:30.16]Plenty d**n many when you want one more
[01:33.28]Of this broke heart fool on an old bar stool
[01:36.53]Drinkin' beer almost as cold as you
[01:53.27]Then guys like me
[01:54.90]You girl like it
[01:56.73]Thats were we run till
[02:01.45]They got Whiskey River on a jukebox
[02:05.09]A honky tonk sawdust dance floor
[02:08.31]A neon five o'clock pro clock
[02:11.82]Plenty d**n many when you want one more
[02:15.01]Of this broke heart fool on an old bar stool
[02:18.32]Drinkin' beer almost as cold as you
data.trans:
[ti:Cold As You]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:What You See Ain't Always What You Get (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.65]//
[00:13.30]//
[00:19.96]只是乡间小路上一块被废弃的地方
[00:23.64]插着一支箭的窗口标志闪烁着
[00:26.78]砾石路上堵满载有工具箱的卡车
[00:30.23]享受着回家路上的快乐时光
[00:33.45]如果男人们像我一样 失去了你这样的姑娘
[00:36.76]那就是我们要奔赴的方向
[00:39.77]他们在点唱机上放了一首Whiskey River 
[00:43.39]柔弱的白人男子在舞池里 竭力表现自己的魅力
[00:46.69]霓虹灯闪烁 五点钟 时钟敲响
[00:50.13]在你想要再来一杯的时候 你已经喝得足够多
[00:53.06]这个心碎的傻瓜坐在一把老旧的吧台椅上
[00:56.66]喝着和你差不多一样冰冷的啤酒
[01:06.63]大把好时光就耗在了那扇隔断门上
[01:10.21]想象你被钉在飞镖靶上
[01:13.33]那些煤渣砖墙从来没有被清理过
[01:16.87]可它们还是比不上你对我做的那些事肮脏
[01:20.21]在点唱机上放起Whiskey River
[01:23.38]柔弱的白人男子在舞池里 竭力表现自己的魅力
[01:26.73]霓虹灯闪烁 五点钟 时钟敲响
[01:30.16]在你想要再来一杯的时候 你已经喝得足够多
[01:33.28]这个心碎的傻瓜坐在一把老旧的吧台椅上
[01:36.53]喝着和你差不多一样冰冷的啤酒
[01:53.27]像我这样的男人
[01:54.90]很受你们姑娘的欢迎
[01:56.73]那就是我们曾经的目标
[02:01.45]他们在点唱机上放了一首Whiskey River 
[02:05.09]柔弱的白人男子在舞池里 竭力表现自己的魅力
[02:08.31]霓虹灯闪烁 五点钟 时钟敲响
[02:11.82]在你想要再来一杯的时候 你已经喝得足够多
[02:15.01]这个心碎的傻瓜坐在一把老旧的吧台椅上 
[02:18.32]喝着和你差不多一样冰冷的啤酒
